content: bor row 4 19 19 21 21 23 sts remain marker switch to smaller needles if desired continue working in the round on the rs sl1 and continue working with c1 only k6 k6 k7 k7 k8 this is the new bor move sizes xs m and xl only knit to m2 i e to the bor marker here please note that bor is the end of instep this is the new bor not exactly at the centre of the heel turn sizes s and l only knit to m1 i e to the beginning of instep this is the new bor gusset work in stockinette stitch with c1 until foot k12 k12 k13 k13 k14 measures approximately 3 5 4 4 4 4 4 5 cm / 1¼ 1½ 1½ 1½ 1½ 1¾ inches less than pick up and knit 15 16 17 18 19 sts or one the desired final length stitch for every two row of the heel flap along the left edge of the heel flap and one extra stitch between the heel flap and needle 1 place m1 to indicate the start of instep jos tahdot niin socks page 3/6 toe abbreviations please note that bor is now at the end of the bor - beginning of round instep for sizes xs m and xl and at the c1 2 - colour 1 2 beginning of the instep for sizes s and l there hs - hiding stitch see description of the stitch are 29 33 33 37 37 sts on the instep and 31 in the technical tips section 31 35 35 39 sts on the sole k - knit k2tog - knit 2 sts together start the toe decreases at bor i e m2 m1 m1 2 - stitch marker 1 2 m2 m1 m2 p - purl round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before next p2tog - purl 2 sts together marker k2tog k1 sm ssk knit to 2 sts before pm - place marker bor k2tog sm rm - remove marker round s - round s round 2 knit rs - right side sl - slip repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 19 21 21 25 25 sm - slip marker sts remain on the instep and 21 19 23 23 ssk - slip slip knit 27 sts remain on the sole then repeat round 1 st s - stitches only until 9 11 11 15 15 sts remain in the ws - wrong side instep and 11 9 13 13 17 sts remain in the sole finally remove bor marker k2tog knit to 2 sts before next marker and ssk cut c1 and graft the toe finishing soak the socks in lukewarm water remove excess water by rolling the socks in a towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in the ends technical tips knit hs with right hand needle pick up the right leg of the stitch one row below the next stitch from back
